Messages.StartMessage:
Hi there! I'm here to help you purchase your car insurance quickly and easily.

To get started, please send us the following documents:
📄 A photo of your passport
🚙 A photo of your vehicle identification document (technical passport)

Once we receive these, we’ll guide you through the next steps! 😊
Messages.IncorrectPhotoMessagge: Sorry, the photo you sent is not clear enough. Please take a new photo and send it again.
Messages.PassportShouldBeSentInOneMessage: Please send one photo in message. It should be your passport.
Messages.TechnicalPassportShouldBeSentInOneMessag: Please send one photo in message. It should be your technical passport.
Messages.PassportSubmittedMessage: Great! We have processed your passport. Please send us a photo of your vehicle identification document (technical passport).
Messages.DataSubmittedMessage: Great! We have processed your documents. The insurance will cost you $100, do you agree?
Messages.DataRejectedMessage: Sorry for the inconvenience, please take another photos of your documents and try again.
Messages.CostDisagreedMessage: We apologize, we are currently unable to provide the service in a different price range. Do you agree to the price of $100?
Messages.WeProcessedYourPhotoMessage: We have processed your photo, please check the data is correct and we will continue
Messages.WeSavedYourDataMessage: We have saved your data, you should not re-upload photos.
